'''Laura de Llorens Garcia''' is a Design Director<ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/credits</ref> at [[Mojang Studios]].

Laura is from Barcelona and currently works in Sweden.<ref>http://www.lauradellorens.com/about</ref>

== Trivia ==
* Laura once stated that between {{MCD|Archie}} and {{MCD|Valorie}}, she'd rather go out to dinner with Archie.<ref>[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3QsJ8OYHafs&t=21s Ask Mojang #19: Deep Dive into Dungeons (and Dinner?!)]</ref>
